title: Extreme lag/ping on one PC but not another
body: Okay so I recently got my alienware x51 working again. i started playing league on it a few days ago and all was fine until this morning. Now when I play on it I get on average 200MS of ping which it will jump all over from 200 to 1000. I though my internet must be FUBAR but just a bit ago I logged onto league on my laptop. I played a custom match first with no issues about 40MS ping which is good for me. Then I played a normal game, no lag and no insane lag spikes. I tried one solution where I went into windows firewall and created a "outgoing protocol" or something like that I entered in these IP addresses like this post told me but when I tried to make a custom game the client would crash. I couldn't reconnect to league until I deleted said protocols. But there is still the insane lag ONLY on that PC.. any suggestions??

replies.body:
There may be specific issues with the local configurations or network adapter on that one PC that isn't on the others. I recommend updating all your drivers through your PC Manufacturer's Support site, then work through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to configure your network settings for League.

Let me know if you noticed any changes as a result of those steps.
